mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, C_NO, C_ID, C_EMAIL, C_NAME, C_NICKNAME, C_BIRTH, C_PHONE, C_POINT, C_POSTCODE, C_ADDRESS, C_ENROLL_DATE, C_STATUS, C_PROFILE, C_MARKETING FROM (SELECT C_NO, C_ID, C_EMAIL, C_NAME, C_NICKNAME, C_BIRTH, C_PHONE, C_POINT, C_POSTCODE, C_ADDRESS, C_ENROLL_DATE, C_STATUS, C_PROFILE, C_MARKETING FROM CLIENT ORDER BY C_ENROLL_DATE DESC )

SELECT C.C_NO, C_ID, C_EMAIL, C_NICKNAME, C_NAME, C_BIRTH, C_PHONE, C_POINT, C_POSTCODE, C_ADDRESS, PRO.PRO_RENAME, PRO.PRO_ORIGIN, C_MARKETING, C_ENROLL_DATE, C_STATUS FROM CLIENT C LEFT JOIN PROFILEPHOTO PRO ON(C.C_NO = PRO.C_NO) WHERE C.C_NO = #{cNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE CLIENT SET C_ID = #{userId}, C_NICKNAME = #{nickName}, C_NAME = #{userName}, C_BIRTH = #{birth}, C_PHONE = #{phone}, C_EMAIL = #{email}, C_POINT = #{point}, C_POSTCODE = #{post}, C_ADDRESS = #{address}, C_MARKETING = #{marketing}, C_STATUS = #{status} WHERE C_NO = #{cNo}
